title: VCMI town building format
description: Format used to define town buildings in VCMI

items.description: First item that indicates type of following expression

additionalItems.description: Following items that contain expression elements

mode.description: Mode in which this building will be built

requires.description: List of town buildings that must be built before this one

upgrades.description: Optional, indicates that this building upgrades another base building

upgradeReplacesBonuses.description: If set to true, this building will replace all bonuses from base building, leaving only bonuses defined by this building

manualHeroVisit.description: If set to true, this building will not automatically activate on new day or on entering town and needs to be activated manually on click

mapObjectLikeBonuses.description: Optional, all bonuses granted by configurable buildings will have source set to specified map object

configuration.description: Optional, configuration of building that can be activated by visiting hero

fortifications.description: Fortifications provided by this buildings, if any

citadelShooter.description: Creature ID of shooter located in central keep (citadel). Used only if citadel is present.

upperTowerShooter.description: Creature ID of shooter located in upper tower. Used only if upper tower is present.

lowerTowerShooter.description: Creature ID of shooter located in lower tower. Used only if lower tower is present.

wallsHealth.description: Maximum health of destructible walls. Walls are only present if their health is above zero

citadelHealth.description: Maximum health of central tower or 0 if not present. Requires walls presence.

upperTowerHealth.description: Maximum health of upper tower or 0 if not present. Requires walls presence.

lowerTowerHealth.description: Maximum health of lower tower or 0 if not present. Requires walls presence.

hasMoat.description: If set to true, moat will be placed in front of the walls. Requires walls presence.

produce.description: Resources produced each day by this building

warMachine.description: Artifact ID of a war machine that can be purchased in this building, if any

bonuses.description: Bonuses that are provided by this building in any town where this building has been built. Only affects town itself (including siege), to propagate effect to player or team please use bonus propagators

marketModes.description: List of modes available in this market

marketOffer.description: List of predefined items available on market from this building
